item.description:
Join the collective to see TMBG in concert at Lupo's. If you don't know who They Might Be Giants are, then you are in for a treat. They have been performing smart indie pop/rock for over 20 years. Yes I know TMBG have been doing albums for children lately, but I promise they know how to entertain adults too. Do you like the theme song from Malcolm in the Middle? It's a TMBG song. Do you know all the songs from Flood? Then you should definitely come. Who doesn't love "Birdhouse in your Soul"? Need to learn more about the band, then check out their wiki.

TMBG have been playing Lupo's a lot in the past few years, and it is a show that should not be missed.


Buy your tickets at Lupo's or online at etix
GA ($22 Advance/$25 Day of)
item.name: They Might Be Giants at Lupos
